title: Muggsy Bogues doesn't think there should be a 'Space Jam' remake
text:
Published By: USATODAY.com: NBA - Today 
Muggsy Bogues crushes dreams of 'Space Jam' fans everywhere, says he doesn't think there should be a remake ...
